com.poesys.db.dao.ddl

Class ExecuteSql

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.db.dao.ddl.ExecuteSql
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExecuteSql

    public class ExecuteSql
extends java.lang.Object
implements IExecuteSql
    An implementation of the ISql interface that executes the SQL statement on demand.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExecuteSql

        public ExecuteSql(ISql sql,
          java.lang.String subsystem)
        Create an ExecuteSql object, supplying the SQL statement object.
        Parameters:
        sql - the SQL statement object
        subsystem - the database subsystem in which to execute the SQL DDL

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Description copied from interface: IExecuteSql
        Execute the registered SQL DDL statement.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface IExecuteSql

      • getRunnableObject

        protected java.lang.Runnable getRunnableObject()
        Create a runnable query object that runs within a PoesysTrackingThread. The run method executes the SQL DDL statement. The thread then terminates after committing and closing the connection.
        Returns:
        the runnable object
